string.text:
You signed a Pact with the Zone. You are being rewarded with amazing abilities in exchange for your life force. To prevent your demise and prolong your existence, you are given a chance to sacrifice other Zone's riches. The quality of the offering matters as you will be compensated appropriately. Do not slack off and remember - the clock is ticking.
 
 %c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]The Lucifer Effect
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Lucifer grants you immense strength and abilities, making you a demigod
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]At max condition you receive:
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 15%%c[ui_gray_3] reduction of any damage
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 35%%c[ui_gray_3] increase in speed
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 1%/sec%c[ui_gray_3] health regen
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 3%/sec%c[ui_gray_3] psy regen
 %c[0,192,71,221] - +50kg%c[ui_gray_3] of carry weight
 
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Lucifer will always work even from the backpack 
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]However, your powers are very short-lived (about 4 days) and drain artefact energy
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]With each % of energy loss your powers will be weaker
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]At 50% you will have no powers
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Less than 50% the artefact will start to consume your soul to live, resulting in slight loss of stamina at first
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Less than 40% and your health will start to disappear, first slow, then increasing as condition decreases
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]You can sacrifice mere usual artefacts to partially restore Lucifer's condition
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Tier 1 artefacts restore 3-5%
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Tier 2 artefacts restore 6-9%
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Tier 3 artefacts restore 10-13%
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Extra Knot artefacts restore 20-30%
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Seraphim can't be sacrificed
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Death Lamp will overcharge artefact, restoring it to 100% and temporarily boosting it even more
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]There is a slight chance that overcharging with Death Lamp will tear you apart
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]You cannot dispose of the artefact by any means
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Lucifer has unknown influence on other artefacts, enhancing their effects in various ways 
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Find more artefacts to restore Lucifer's condition or face the consequences
